title: "Tesla (TSLA) secures new 197 MWh Megapack order to go on its Autobidder AI platform"
excerpt: "Tesla (TSLA) has secured a new Megapack order for 197 MWh of capacity to deploy in the UK and use its Autobidder AI platform. Megapack has quickly emerged as the leading battery system for large utility-scale energy storage systems."
